e: 例⃝「`他~`是~`一~`位~`大器晚成~`的~`學者~」。
d.f: `原~`指~`貴重~`的~`器物~`需要~`長期~`的~`雕琢~`才能~`製~`成~。`現~`指~`能~`擔負~`重任~`的~`人~`須~`經過~`長期~`的~`磨煉~，`所以~`成材~`較~`晚~。

francais: (expr. idiom.) un grand vase advient au Soleil couchant
Rome ne s'est pas construite en un jour
les grands génies se révèlent sur le tard
English: lit. it takes a long time to make a big pot (idiom); fig. a great talent matures slowly
in the fullness of time a major figure will develop into a pillar of the state
Rome wasn't built in a day
